DOC.brief_summary: The main aim present project include 1 ) study longitudinal effect whole-body vibratory exercise bone metabolism adolescent without DS 2 ) evaluate whether low frequency vibratory train program consist 3 session per week 9 month ( vibratory session last approximately 10 minute include 5-6 bout 1 min 1 min rest bout ) improve bone development population . Finally , additional aim project 3 ) determine long effect may last end intervention .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Whole-body Vibration Training Body Composition Adolescents With Without Down Syndrome
DOC.criteria: Both group : Ages 10 19 . Both group : Parental/guardian permission ( informed consent ) appropriate , child verbal assent . Down syndrome group : Diagnosis Down syndrome . Taking medication affect bone . Noncaucasian .
